const batsmanDataBangladesh = [ { name: 'Liton Das', runs: 82, balls: 122, minutes: 200, fours: 10, sixes: 1, strikeRate: 67.21 }, { name: 'Najmul Hossain Shanto', runs: 54, balls: 101, minutes: 180, fours: 7, sixes: 0, strikeRate: 53.47 }, { name: 'Shakib Al Hasan', runs: 29, balls: 64, minutes: 110, fours: 3, sixes: 0, strikeRate: 45.31 }, { name: 'Mushfiqur Rahim', runs: 48, balls: 98, minutes: 150, fours: 5, sixes: 0, strikeRate: 48.97 }, { name: 'Mehidy Hasan', runs: 8, balls: 24, minutes: 45, fours: 0, sixes: 0, strikeRate: 33.33 }, { name: 'Taskin Ahmed', runs: 12, balls: 17, minutes: 35, fours: 1, sixes: 0, strikeRate: 70.59 }, ]; export default function ScoreCard() { return (
